name: FFPERIODIC
desc: A structure containing type-specific information for certain effects.

items.name: init(dwMagnitude: DWORD, lOffset: LONG, dwPhase: DWORD, dwPeriod: DWORD)
var dwMagnitude: DWORD
items.desc: Magnitude of the effect, in the range from 0 through 10,000. If an envelope is applied to this effect, the value represents the magnitude of the sustain. If no envelope is applied, the value represents the amplitude of the entire effect.

items.name: var dwPeriod: DWORD
items.desc: Period of the effect, in microseconds.

items.name: var dwPhase: DWORD
items.desc: Position in the cycle of the periodic effect at which playback begins, in the range from 0 through 35,999.

items.name: var lOffset: LONG
items.desc: Offset of the effect. The range of forces generated by the effect is lOffset minus dwMagnitude to lOffset plus dwMagnitude. The value of the lOffset member is also the baseline for any envelope that is applied to the effect.
